Crystal Ganesh Idols are ideal to offer praise and worship. These Ganesh Murtis also have various benefits and healing properties based on the crystals used to carve them. Lord Ganesha is renowned for removing obstacles in one's life. Ganesha also stands as a symbol of wisdom, protection and prosperity. Elephants are considered a symbol of good luck, wisdom, fertility, and protection.
